document.full_text: slovakia's peter sagan powered ahead over the final 100 meters to win the fifth stage of the tour of california on thursday while american chris horner retained the overall lead.
document.title: sagan wins fifth stage, horner retains overall lead
lines_and_colors: slovakia's peter sagan powered ahead over the final 100 meters to win the fifth stage of the tour of california on thursday while american chris horner retained the overall lead.
